debugger.title: Rule Debugger

tutorial.step1Desc: This interactive demo shows how the Action Rule Event engine works. Let's walk through the key parts.
tutorial.step2Desc: Select an event type, adjust its data, and click Fire to trigger the engine pipeline.
tutorial.step3Desc: Rules define conditions and actions. When an event fires, rules with matching conditions execute their actions. Toggle them on/off to experiment.
tutorial.step4Desc: Actions are what rules execute when their conditions are met. Each action is registered with the engine.
tutorial.step5Desc: Watch real-time engine output as events are processed through the pipeline.
tutorial.step6Desc: The engine context stores key-value data that conditions evaluate against. It persists between event fires.
tutorial.step7Desc: See which rules fired or were skipped. Switch to Trace mode for detailed condition-by-condition analysis.
